root.name: Cabela's Adventure Camp
root.description: OverviewCabela's Adventure Camp is a minigame collection developed by Cauldron and published by Activision for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Wii platforms.GameplayFeatures Thrill Hill Biking, Wild River Kayaking, Full Throttle Wave Riding and more. "Interactive Griefing" allows idle players to grief others by knocking down trees and rocks creating in-game obstacles for the main player.Game ModesThere are three different play options the player has when starting a game of Cabela's Adventure Camp:Cabela's Cup - In the Cabela's Cup mode the mini-games are played in a series. In a multiplayer game, the participating players play a game of "Bear, Hunter, Ninja" to determine who gets to choose the games for each "week".Free Play - Free play mode is a free choice mode. Any of the games various mini-games can be selected and can be played in single or multiplayer.My Cabin - The my cabin section holds the players stats, trophies, and gear that has been earned through all of the playtime.
